channel.title: Removing the perfect ring when a player opens case82
channel.description:
i just need the statment for removing a item when a player clicks a object, eg
My fight arena door, it tele blocks your (already did tht)
and now i want it to remove certain items
i tryed
removeItem(773); but that dident work

item.title: Removing the perfect ring when a player opens case82
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

no its not, its got a 10k+ to each stat

Read full topic
item.source: Removing the perfect ring when a player opens case82

item.title: Removing the perfect ring when a player opens case82
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

There is no point of having the item if it’s worthless. They’ll just drop it. It’s more simplier.

Read full topic
item.source: Removing the perfect ring when a player opens case82

u dont understand, i want them to lose the item when they open the door
